overview: A young girl is cured of her epilepsy just as summer vacation is about to begin. During her last days with her classmates, sheâ€™ll come to experience life in a new way. Arranged as a series of elliptical tableaux, this haunting narrative from Luise Donschen (Casanova Gene) captures a simultaneous sense of discovery and disorientation as it proceeds from the confines of the classroom to a wider world of adolescent anxieties.
title: Entire Days Together
